keyMoments.title: Karoo's Debut
keyMoments.description: Karoo appears for the first time as Miss Wednesday's (Vivi's) loyal mount during her battle against Zoro. He panics during the fight, causing Vivi's attack to miss.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of Vivi's faithful companion who will travel with the Straw Hats during the Arabasta Saga.

occupations: Captain of the Super Spot-Billed Duck Troops

abilities.description: As a super spot-billed duck, Karoo can run at exceptional speeds across vast distances.

relationships.description: Karoo is Princess Vivi's loyal pet and battle mount who followed her when she infiltrated Baroque Works.

evolutionMoments.description: Karoo is introduced as Vivi's mount during the battle at Whisky Peak.

reveals.information: Super spot-billed duck from Arabasta Kingdom
Captain of the Super Spot-Billed Duck Troops

keyMoments.title: Mr. 5 Arrives at Whisky Peak
keyMoments.description: Mr. 5 arrives at Whisky Peak with Miss Valentine on a mission to eliminate the spies who have infiltrated Baroque Works.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of the first Baroque Works Officer Agent with Devil Fruit powers.
keyMoments.quote: They are important members of the Arabasta Kingdom who know the Boss's secret.

keyMoments.title: Bomu Bomu no Mi Revealed
keyMoments.description: Mr. 5 demonstrates his ability to make any part of his body explode without harming himself.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of explosive Devil Fruit powers in the series.

keyMoments.title: Mission to Eliminate Vivi and Igaram
keyMoments.description: Mr. 5 explains that he and Miss Valentine have been sent to eliminate Mr. 8 and Miss Wednesday for being spies.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the stakes of Vivi's infiltration and the danger she faces.
keyMoments.quote: They are important members of the Arabasta Kingdom who know the Boss's secret.

abilities.description: Can make any part of his body explode, including breath and bodily secretions, without harming himself.
Breathes into his flintlock revolver to create invisible explosive air bullets.

relationships.description: Partners with Miss Valentine as Baroque Works Officer Agents.

evolutionMoments.description: Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine arrive together at Whisky Peak on their mission.

reveals.information: Ate the Bomu Bomu no Mi
Sent to eliminate Vivi and Igaram for learning Baroque Works boss's identity

keyMoments.title: Miss Valentine Arrives at Whisky Peak
keyMoments.description: Miss Valentine arrives at Whisky Peak with Mr. 5 on a mission to eliminate the spies who have infiltrated Baroque Works.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a Baroque Works Officer Agent with weight-manipulation Devil Fruit powers.

keyMoments.title: Kiro Kiro no Mi Revealed
keyMoments.description: Miss Valentine demonstrates her ability to change her weight from 1 kilogram to 10,000 kilograms at will.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of weight-manipulation Devil Fruit powers in the series.

abilities.description: Can change her body weight from 1 kilogram to 10,000 kilograms at will.
By reducing her weight to 1 kilogram, she can float using her parasol.
Progressively increases her weight to crush opponents beneath her.

relationships.description: Partners with Mr. 5 as Baroque Works Officer Agents. She often uses his explosions to launch herself into the air.

evolutionMoments.description: Miss Valentine and Mr. 5 arrive together at Whisky Peak on their mission.

reveals.information: Ate the Kiro Kiro no Mi
Baroque Works Officer Agent Miss Valentine

keyMoments.title: Sandai Kitetsu's Cursed Nature Revealed
keyMoments.description: Zoro discovers that Sandai Kitetsu acts on its own when it blocks an attack without his command.
keyMoments.significance: First confirmation of the sword's cursed properties and independent will.
keyMoments.quote: Now I understand why it's cursed.

keyMoments.title: Testing New Swords in Combat
keyMoments.description: Zoro uses Yubashiri and Sandai Kitetsu in actual combat for the first time.
keyMoments.significance: First real battle test of the swords acquired in Loguetown.

reveals.information: Discovers Sandai Kitetsu's cursed nature - the sword acts independently

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Zoro
keyMoments.description: Vivi, still disguised as Miss Wednesday, attempts to fight Zoro with Karoo but is defeated.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the gap in combat ability between Vivi and the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: True Identity Revealed
keyMoments.description: Vivi's true identity as Princess Nefertari Vivi of the Arabasta Kingdom is revealed by Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine.
keyMoments.significance: Major character revelation that transforms her role from Baroque Works agent to princess and spy.

relationships.description: Karoo is Vivi's loyal pet and battle mount.

evolutionMoments.description: Karoo is shown serving as Vivi's mount in battle.

reveals.information: Revealed to be Princess Nefertari Vivi of Arabasta Kingdom
Infiltrated Baroque Works as a spy to uncover the boss's identity
Knows the true identity of Baroque Works' boss

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Zoro
keyMoments.description: Igaram, fighting as Mr. 8, is defeated by Zoro using his saxophone guns and curly hair attacks.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Zoro's superiority even against armed opponents.

keyMoments.title: True Identity Revealed
keyMoments.description: Igaram's true identity as the captain of Arabasta's Royal Guard is revealed by Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Igaram as a loyal servant of the Arabasta Kingdom who infiltrated Baroque Works.

relationships.description: Igaram serves and protects Princess Vivi, infiltrating Baroque Works alongside her.

evolutionMoments.description: Revealed that Igaram infiltrated Baroque Works to protect Vivi.

reveals.information: Revealed to be Captain of Arabasta's Royal Guard
Infiltrated Baroque Works alongside Vivi to protect her and uncover the conspiracy
